content: lots of people love balloon animals but they always have an unfortunate tendency to pop or deflate over time so why not make a more long-lasting version this cuddly plush has a beginner-friendly pattern and makes a perfect companion for any dog and/or balloon lover materials * 5mm crochet hook * worsted weight yarn about 200g * polyester fiberfill * yarn needle you can use whatever yarn and hook size you d like just be aware that it will change the size of the finished product i used the materials above and my plush measures 8 ½ inches long and 8 inches tall
